text:
Piero Chiambretti (born 30 May 1956) is an Italian television presenter. He was born in Aosta. He has presented many different TV shows since 1977. His credits include "Non siamo gazzose", "Va Pensiero", "Markette – tutto fa brodo in tv", "Chiambretti Night", "Chiambretti Supermarket" and "Striscia la Notizia".
In March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, Chiambretti tested positive for COVID-19.
